<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Gender Leave Allocation -Male</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	
	var leaveBucket = new GlideRecord('x_573882_leave_app_leave_bucket');
            leaveBucket.initialize();
            leaveBucket.leave_type = 'pl';
            leaveBucket.accrued = 60;
            leaveBucket.balance = 60;
            leaveBucket.taken = 0;
			leaveBucket.employee = current.sys_id;
			leaveBucket.insert();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-12 10:37:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f1cb32992fde20109939d49df699b628</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Gender Leave Allocation -Male</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave App" source="x_573882_leave_app">8affb7172f86e0109939d49df699b653</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave App">8affb7172f86e0109939d49df699b653</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f1cb32992fde20109939d49df699b628</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-12 10:37:37</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=f1cb32992fde20109939d49df699b628"/></record_update>
